Sentencas: The sugar industry is considered a high-energy-demand and wasteful industrial sector in many developing countries.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Such a high energy demand can undermine the sugar industry's economic and environmental aspects.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Shifting from a linear economy model to a circular economy (CE) can help this industrial sector solve the current economic and environmental crises, decrease dependencies on fossil-based energies, increase circularity, and save considerable resources.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: However, such a transition necessitates comprehensive pre-feasibility studies to avoid problem shifts.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Herein, we compared some novel waste-to-energy (WtE) technologies from a life cycle assessment (LCA) point of view; (a) integrated supercritical water gasification (SCWG) at 700 degrees C with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), (b) integrated SCWG at 700 degrees C with combined cycle gas turbine (CCGT), (c) cogeneration (Boiler), (d) integrated fixed-bed gasification combined cycle (IFXBGCC), and (e) integrated fluidized-bed gasification combined cycle (IFLBGCC).
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Iran, as a developing country with high dependencies on fossil re-sources and less CE implementation, was selected as a case study.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Scenarios were compared using a functional unit (FU) of thermal management of 1 tonne of bagasse.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: SCWG is found to be an environmentally superior approach when hydrogen production is the primary function of the system.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Otherwise, using boiler and steam turbine is is still the best approach to generate heat and electricity from bagasse.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: Direct combustion in the boiler showed considerable savings in climate change, i.e., 469 kg CO2 eq saving/FU.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management

Sentencas: The LCA results showed that bagasse to energy throughout direct combustion is a promising pathway to generating clean energy; in addition to helping industries earn more income, and contribute to sustainable development.
Titulo: Early environmental sustainability guidance on supercritical water gasification technologies for sugarcane bagasse management
